entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Hamilton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:22 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 10:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 7.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 82 %
Dewpoint: 4.2°C
Wind: SW 45 km/h gust 59 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
